baseline.title: Project Baseline

baseline.lockDescription: Lock the current 8 pillars as a baseline before work begins. This allows tracking changes throughout the project.
baseline.confirmDesc: This will save the current state of all 8 operational truth pillars. You can track changes against this baseline as the project progresses.
baseline.willBeLocked: The following values will be locked:
baseline.modifyDesc: Changes will create a new baseline version. Previous versions are preserved in the audit log.

baseline.reasonNote: This will be recorded in the Decision Log for audit purposes.
baseline.initialNotePlaceholder: e.g. Initial baseline based on AI analysis
baseline.datesRequired: Both dates are required to lock baseline
baseline.datesSynced: Project dates synced across all timelines

footer.tagline: Construction grade project management for teams who build the real world.
footer.craftedWith: Crafted with precision for those who build.

landing.tagline: Construction grade project management platform for teams who build the real world
landing.visionP1: More than five hundred years ago in Florence, a twelve-ton block of marble stood — cracked, shapeless, and forgotten by the masters for forty years.
landing.visionP2: But a young sculptor somehow saw the value in it.
landing.visionP3: For three years, and with more than a million strikes of his hammer, he worked until the hidden figure within was finally free. When asked how he created it, he simply said:
landing.visionQuote: The sculpture was already in the stone. I just removed everything that was not David.
landing.visionP4: BuildUnion sees the same hidden potential within today's construction world — in 4.6 million skilled professionals, in thousands of growing companies, and in the human hands that build the future every single day.
landing.visionConclusion: Because sometimes, the masterpiece isn't built. It's uncovered.

upsell.regenerateDesc: Pro users get enhanced AI analysis with higher accuracy

hero.description: BuildUnion is a revolutionary platform connecting construction professionals with cutting-edge AI technology to streamline project management, enhance collaboration, and deliver exceptional results.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: We believe every construction project deserves precision, transparency, and efficiency. Our mission is to empower contractors, project managers, and tradespeople with intelligent tools that transform how projects are planned, executed, and delivered.

community.title: Community First
community.description: We build for the people who build our world. Every feature is designed with real construction professionals in mind.

precision.title: Precision
precision.description: From AI-powered estimates to detailed project tracking, accuracy is at the heart of everything we do.

passion.title: Passion
passion.description: We're passionate about construction and technology, bringing innovation to an industry that shapes our daily lives.

trust.title: Trust
trust.description: Security and reliability are non-negotiable. Your data and projects are protected with enterprise-grade security.

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.description: We strive for excellence in every line of code, every feature, and every interaction with our users.

global.title: Global Reach
global.description: Supporting 11 languages and serving construction professionals worldwide, from local contractors to international teams.

story.title: Our Story
story.paragraph1: BuildUnion was born from a simple observation: the construction industry, one of the largest and most important sectors globally, was underserved by modern technology. While other industries embraced digital transformation, construction professionals were left with outdated tools and fragmented workflows.
story.paragraph2: We set out to change that. By combining AI-powered analysis, real-time collaboration, and intuitive design, we created a platform that speaks the language of construction. From solo contractors managing residential projects to large teams coordinating commercial developments, BuildUnion adapts to your needs.
story.paragraph3: Today, we continue to innovate, adding features like dual-engine AI verification, Ontario Building Code compliance checking, and comprehensive project synthesis. But our core mission remains the same: to help construction professionals work smarter, not harder.

cta.title: Ready to Transform Your Projects?
cta.description: Join thousands of construction professionals who trust BuildUnion to deliver their projects on time, on budget, and beyond expectations.
